tests.description: Check if specific event was triggered
tests.reasoning: This test is necessary to ensure that a user registration event is triggered when the task requires completing a signup form to create a new user account, without any specific username criteria.

use_case.name: User Registration
use_case.description: The user fills out the registration form and successfully creates a new account.
prompt_examples: Fill out the registration form and register
